title: Visual Design Principles and Application Strategies for Geography Textbooks

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geography concepts and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Case-based learning emphasizing job relevance for professional practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more ways in which visual elements in geography textbooks influence learning motivation and knowledge construction
Learners can evaluate visual materials applying information design principles (aesthetic appeal, navigability, content connectivity)
Learners can design one or more multimodal learning resources considering text-image interaction
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
